name: SABOR DE BARRIO
description: A brand transformation project that redefined Chancaca Deliciosa's identity, creating a modern and authentic connection with its audience through a fresh visual language and compelling storytelling.
fullDescription: Transform Chancaca Deliciosa's brand identity to better connect with its audience while maintaining its authentic essence. The project involved creating a new visual language, packaging design, and brand strategy that would resonate with modern consumers while honoring the brand's traditional roots.

gallery.featureText: The rebranding project successfully modernized Chancaca Deliciosa's image while preserving its authentic essence, creating a stronger emotional connection with consumers.

sections.content: Transform Chancaca Deliciosa's brand identity to better connect with its audience while maintaining its authentic essence. The project involved creating a new visual language, packaging design, and brand strategy that would resonate with modern consumers while honoring the brand's traditional roots.

Our team developed a comprehensive brand strategy that included new visual identity, packaging design, and brand guidelines. The new design system reflects the brand's heritage while appealing to contemporary consumers, creating a perfect balance between tradition and modernity.
